original_title: A Boy on a Dock Blowing his Nose
overview: Barry Doup√©'s lusty A Boy on a Dock Blowing His Nose features vaguely articulated, quasi-human doodles and Spirographs animated within a bizarre netherworld of its own humid imagination.
tagline: "I remember from the other room I could hear you violently buttering bread. I secretly hoped that I could be your next victim."
title: A Boy on a Dock Blowing his Nose
